nodes.text: Corporal Dregg is a male Human soldier who served in the Mantellian army of the Galactic Republic during the Cold War.

Stationed on Ord Mantell during the Separatist War, Corporal Dregg and two other Mantellian soldiers, Ensigns Ta and Peters, have devised a life-or-death game of chance in the region. They challenge refugees in the area to run the mines and gather three unexploded shells. They allow bets on the outcomes of these runs, and anyone who succeeds is awarded with equipment from the relief supplies.
